attributes.action: Stop companies discriminating against multi coloured hair.
attributes.additional_details: I’m starting this petition to end this policy in all contracts as how you look should not be based on your performance at work, as long  as you are not offending anyone around you.
attributes.background:
As tattoos have become more accepting in the work place, I think so should your hair colour. 

For many people, this is not a “fashion statement” - this is self expression; an identity. 

It shouldn’t matter how you look but how hard you work, how good and polite you are to others too!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
